quote: I know what the fear is.The fear is not for what is lost.What is lost is already in the wall.What is lost is already behind the locked doors.The fear is for what is still to be lost.
quote_letters: I KNOW WHAT THE FEAR ISTHE FEAR IS NOT FOR WHAT IS LOSTWHAT IS LOST IS ALREADY IN THE WALLWHAT IS LOST IS ALREADY BEHIND THE LOCKED DOORSTHE FEAR IS FOR WHAT IS STILL TO BE LOST
